overview: A dark comedy short film. As the days and nights in lockdown start to merge, Gerryâ€™s paranoia increases as a 5g tower is due to be switched on in his local area. Spurred on by his fellow conspiracy theorist friend Rosie, Gerry must overcome his agoraphobia and take down the tower.

tagline: A short film by Christopher McGill
title: Fight the Tower
